sourceOfFunds.purpose: NRHM Mobile Medical Unit is a project where the Mobile Bus go to remotest villages under katol, Narkhed
This is NRHM Mobile Medical Unit Project covering around 40 villages of Katol, Narkhed

The Mobile Medical Unit Bus is NRHM Project . This bus consist of Doctor, Nurse, Pharmacist, Lab. Technician and two drivers. This bus goes to the interior of villages of Katol, Narkhed and Saoner blocks and examine patients of two villages every day, and distribute them free Medicine and protein tonics. This team conduct free health check up camps along with local Primary Health Center and also conduct awareness camps on general hygiene. In a month around 3000 patients take benefit byunit

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Phad Irrigation and Self help group Target beneficiaries 9000 members of 750 â€¢ A total 13 beauty parlours, 17 sewing machine, 4 stationeries and 5 Milk business started through SHGs and their families have increased income benefited from the internal financial transactions Business skill development training through HDFC Bank Coverage area:- Pusad Block Objective:- To making women self-reliant Target beneficiary:- HDFC bank linked Women SHGs Results: - â€¢ Established various income generation activities through women training in the villages. â€¢ A total 15 beauty parlours, 23 sewing machine, 18 Stationery shops, 9 Milk centres, 5 grocery shops, 2 daily needs shop and 4 Milk business started through SHGs and their families have increased 2000/- per month income. Micro finance for business through HDFC Bank Coverage area:- Pusad and Arni Block Objective:- To providing micro credit to SHGs for sustainable development. Target beneficiary: - Women SHGs Results: - â€¢ Established 97 various businesses at village level and increase income of families Housing Programme Coverage: 43 families in Pusad and Arni block Activity: Every person has a dream to have a house. But it remains dream because of inadequate fund. Therefore, such families were provided funds to fulfil their dream Achievement: ï… 43 families got own well constructed house through that 500 people got their own canopy ï… The beneficiaries able to construct houses in commercial manner and out of that 1 beneficiary constructed attached daily need shop to his house and sustained his livelihood. Community Based rehabilitation for person with Disability â€¢ Community based support and rehabilitation of people with disabilities (PWD) and children with disabilities (CWD) â€¢ We have been able to form Disable peopleâ€™s organization in 26 villages of Arni Block 426 disable person were member of the organization .Organization took various advocacy issues at gram Panchayat .Taluka and District level for Rights of Disable Person, â€¢ 90 PWDs got various need based Aids and appliances like wheelchairs, Tricycle, low vision aids, special chairs and crutches 86 got bus passes, 85 got certificates of disability, 85 got identity cards. â€¢ Financial support from banks and other sources have been provided to PWDs. Loans have been given to PWDs to start income generating activities. PWD has started small business. PWDs have been motivated to start small business and additional revenue of Rs. 5000/- each. â€¢ PWDs interested in undertaking entrepreneurship have been provided trainings on undertaking small business such as daily needs shops, paan shops, stationery stops, floor mills, hair salons, tailoring shops, etc. â€¢ 50 PWDs have been benefited by schemes such as the IAY, SGNY, MHFDC which has enhanced their incomes by about Rs. 4000-5000/-. Grain Distribution Navvidya Organization have distributed grain for farmers in drought prone area in Hingoli District. Women Empowerment â€¢ Capacity building of women SHGs â€¢ Navvidya working with 1390 SHG groups. â€¢ Provision of credit access and bank linkages to womenâ€™s groups to undertake income generation â€¢ Improved participation of women in Gramsabhas and local level governance

ngoList.title: NeoGandhian Aid Organizations India
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: NeoGandhian is involved in spreading awareness about Prevention of Sexual Harassment of women at workplace, on streets and at home. We have volunteers who are trained to act as members of Internal Complaints Committees of Corporations in accordance with POSH Act of 2013. We have initiated actions to rehabilitate the Rivers in Mumbai ie Dahisar, Oshiwara, Poisar and Mithi. We are involved in conducting an annual event called River March in Mumbai since 2015 with hundreds of focusd volunteers.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: We did not seek grants from Govt in this Financial Year. We worked with donations raised from Promoters. In FY 2012-13 we received a corpus amount of Rs. 1,00,000/- and a donation of Rs. 21,001/-. We commenced conducting women empowerment awareness activities in FY 2012-13. In FY 2013-14 we received a donation of Rs. 2,24,621/-. From January 2014 we initiated actions to prevent Sexual Harassment.

We did not seek granst from Government but worked with funds raised from donations from supporters. In the FY 2015-16, a donation sum of Rs. 81,000/- was raised and we initiated awareness activities through volunteers for PROTECTION OF ENVIRONMENT under RIVER MARCH programme. This project was taken up with the objective of rehabilitating the four rivers in Mumbai called Dahisar, Poisar, Oshiwara and Mithi. This was done in parallel with Women Empowerment activities taken up in the earlier Years.

We did not seek Government funds in this Financial Year too. We worked with donations raised from supporters. Our organiation continued with promoting awareness about women empowerment and environment protection. Our organizational main objective being promoting clean thinking and bringing together individuals intereste in working for the betterment of humanity, society and environment we started promoting the slogan - Soch Swatchh Hoga tho Bharat swachh Banega - which started connecting well.

We dot seek Government funds in this Financial Year but continued working with funds raised as donations from supporters. Our application for grant of 80G certificate was under process. We continued our awareness activities and also started taking up work for Helping the Aged. The river march awareness programme that we commenced picked up momentum. We got our ideation right and initiated a project called MISSION 2047 - Make Dream India Real. Under it we took 8 focus areas.

In October 2017 our organization received 80G certification from the Income Tax Department. However we did not seek grants from the Government but worked with donations raised from supporters. Having completed 6 years the organizations direction became clear and the volunteer base of the organization expanded. Now the organization has become strong enough to take on big social purpose projects. The organizational leadership has become stronger and we started exploring expanding to Hyderabad.
